docs.lead_paragraph: Weeks after hedge fund manager Chris Hansen lost a bid to move the Sacramento Kings NBA basketball team to Seattle, he made an undisclosed donation to a group trying to defeat plans to build a new arena for the team in California, officials said on Friday.

docs.lead_paragraph: Billionaire Chris Hansen, who tried to move the Kings NBA franchise from Sacramento to Seattle, is behind a secretive effort to thwart the city's efforts to build a new downtown arena for the professional basketball team, California's campaign watchdog disclosed Friday after an investigation.

docs.abstract: Richard Sandomir TV Sports column notes that Fox Sports 1, which is poised to spring into existence, appears to be the stiffest competition for ESPN because of the resources of its parent and ambitions of its chairman Rupert Murdoch, but it has a long way to go to match the ESPN empire.

docs.snippet: A Michael Jackson tribute show by Cirque du Soleil startled China’s capital with a brief flash of a censored 1989 photo of a man facing down tanks near Tiananmen....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Michael Jackson tribute show by Cirque du Soleil startled China’s capital with a brief flash of a censored 1989 photo of a man facing down tanks near Tiananmen.
docs.abstract: Memo From Beijing; tribute to Michael Jackson during performance by Cirque du Soleil in Beijing shows Tank Man photograph, image of lone man facing down tanks near Tiananmen Square; Communist Party suppresses any mention of 1989 violence and Cirque du Soleil quickly cut image from subsequent shows; photo's appearance underscores challenges that governments face in controlling history in the modern age.

headline.main: Amid Tribute to King of Pop, an Echo of Tiananmen Square
headline.print_headline: Amid Tribute to King of Pop, An Echo of Tiananmen
